text: That seems like a really good sign that the people who teach there all have that level of experience! I couldn't remember if I sent this link to you about the "bring your own animation" event which is being done in coordination with The Foundry, so here it is  <https://london.siggraph.org/event/christmas-special-byoa-dd/>

I also tried reaching out to a friend at Trixter in Germany. Hopefully I'll hear back from him soon. I have a few more connections in Germany too, so if I don't hear from him quickly, I'll try to reach out to them too

Great! Thanks a lot!
I will check the event out. Let me know if you get any information about Germany :)
